languages.text: The Calixis Sector has many heavily populated and important worlds, but it lies a great distance from the Imperium's core sectors. The sector's first Imperial Sector Governor was Drusus, one of Angevin's most capable generals, a man now revered as a Saint of the Imperial Cult. The Calixis Sector is firmly bound to the frontier of the Koronus Expanse politically and logistically since the only known route to the Expanse lies through the Koronus Passage, a stable but dangerous warp route that was established on the rimward border of the Calixis Sector.
languages.original_text: В секторе Каликсис расположено множество населенных значимых миров, однако сам он расположен на значительном удалении от основных секторов Империума. Первым губернатором сектора был Друз, один из наиболее талантливых генералов Ангевина и ныне почитаемый как святой Имперского культа. Сектор Каликсис плотно связан, политически и логистически, с фронтиром Простора Коронус — единственный известный путь в него пролегает через Проход Коронус, стабильный, но опасный варп-маршрут, который был проложен на внешней границе сектора Каликсис.

traits.locale_text: The Calixis Sector has many heavily populated and important worlds, but it lies a great distance from the Imperium's core sectors. The sector's first Imperial Sector Governor was Drusus, one of Angevin's most capable generals, a man now revered as a Saint of the Imperial Cult. Calixis Sector is firmly bound to the frontier of the Koronus Expanse politically and logistically since the only known route to the Expanse lies through Koronus Passage, a stable but dangerous warp route that was established on the rimward border of Calixis Sector.

languages.text: В секторе Каликсис расположено множество населенных значимых миров, однако сам он расположен на значительном удалении от основных секторов Империума. Первым губернатором сектора был Друз, один из наиболее талантливых генералов Ангевина и ныне почитаемый как святой Имперского культа. Сектор Каликсис плотно связан, политически и логистически, с фронтиром Простора Коронус — единственный известный путь в него пролегает через Проход Коронус, стабильный, но опасный варп-маршрут, который был проложен на внешней границе сектора Каликсис.

Im Calixis-Sektor sind viele stark bevölkerte und wichtige Welten versammelt, aber er ist von den Kernsektoren des Imperiums sehr weit entfernt. Der erste imperiale Sektorgouverneur war Drusus, einer von Angevins fähigsten Generälen. Er wird heute als Heiliger des Imperialen Kults verehrt. Der Calixis-Sektor ist politisch und logistisch eng an die Grenze der Koronus-Ausdehnung gebunden, weil die einzige Route zur Ausdehnung durch die Koronus-Passage führt, eine stabile, aber gefährliche Warproute, die an der äußeren Grenze des Calixis-Sektors eingerichtet wurde.
languages.original_text: The Calixis Sector has many heavily populated and important worlds, but it lies a great distance from the Imperium's core sectors. The sector's first Imperial Sector Governor was Drusus, one of Angevin's most capable generals, a man now revered as a Saint of the Imperial Cult. The Calixis Sector is firmly bound to the frontier of the Koronus Expanse politically and logistically since the only known route to the Expanse lies through the Koronus Passage, a stable but dangerous warp route that was established on the rimward border of the Calixis Sector.

traits.locale_text: Im Calixis-Sektor sind viele stark bevölkerte und wichtige Welten versammelt, aber er ist von den Kernsektoren des Imperiums sehr weit entfernt. Der erste imperiale Sektorgouverneur war Drusus, einer von Angevins fähigsten Generälen. Er wird heute als Heiliger des Imperialen Kults verehrt. Der Calixis-Sektor ist politisch und logistisch eng an die Grenze der Koronus-Ausdehnung gebunden, weil die einzige Route zur Ausdehnung durch die Koronus-Passage führt, eine stabile, aber gefährliche Warproute, die an der äußeren Grenze des Calixis-Sektors eingerichtet wurde.

languages.text: S'il abrite de nombreux mondes importants et densément peuplés, le secteur Calixis n'en est pas moins très éloigné des secteurs centraux de l'Imperium. Drusus, son premier gouverneur impérial était l'un des généraux les plus compétents d'Angevin, qui est aujourd'hui vénéré comme l'un des saints du Culte Impérial. Fermement ancré à la frontière des Étendues de Koronus, tant sur le plan politique que logistique, ses confins sont traversés par le Passage de Koronus, seule route connue du Warp permettant de gagner les Étendues malgré les dangers qu'elle recèle.
languages.original_text: The Calixis Sector has many heavily populated and important worlds, but it lies a great distance from the Imperium's core sectors. The sector's first Imperial Sector Governor was Drusus, one of Angevin's most capable generals, a man now revered as a Saint of the Imperial Cult. The Calixis Sector is firmly bound to the frontier of the Koronus Expanse politically and logistically since the only known route to the Expanse lies through the Koronus Passage, a stable but dangerous warp route that was established on the rimward border of the Calixis Sector.

traits.locale_text: Le secteur Calixis abrite de nombreux mondes importants et densément peuplés, mais il est très éloigné des secteurs centraux de l'Imperium. Son premier gouverneur impérial fut Drusus, l'un des généraux les plus compétents d'Angevin, qui est aujourd'hui vénéré comme l'un des saints du Culte Impérial. Fermement ancré à la frontière des Étendues de Koronus, tant sur le plan politique que logistique, ses confins sont traversés par le Passage de Koronus, seule route connue du Warp permettant de gagner les Étendues malgré les dangers qu'elle recèle.

languages.text: 卡利西斯星区是帝国重要的星区，人口繁多，但离帝国的核心星区较远。卡利西斯星区第一位总督是德鲁苏斯，是安杰文最强大的将军之一，如今成为了帝国国教推崇的圣人。无论是从政治还是后勤层面上，卡利西斯星区都与科罗努斯扩区紧密相连。目前为止，通往科罗努斯扩区唯一的已知航线是科罗努斯甬道。这条亚空间通道位于卡利西斯星区边境，这条航路本身极少发生变化，但却充满了危险。
languages.original_text: The Calixis Sector has many heavily populated and important worlds, but it lies a great distance from the Imperium's core sectors. The sector's first Imperial Sector Governor was Drusus, one of Angevin's most capable generals, a man now revered as a Saint of the Imperial Cult. The Calixis Sector is firmly bound to the frontier of the Koronus Expanse politically and logistically since the only known route to the Expanse lies through the Koronus Passage, a stable but dangerous warp route that was established on the rimward border of the Calixis Sector.

traits.locale_text: 卡利西斯星区是帝国重要的星区，人口繁多，但离帝国的核心星区较远。卡利西斯星区第一位总督是德鲁苏斯，是安杰文最强大的将军之一，如今成为了帝国国教推崇的圣人。无论是从政治还是后勤层面上，卡利西斯星区都与科罗努斯扩区紧密相连。目前为止，通往科罗努斯扩区唯一的已知航线是科罗努斯甬道。这条亚空间通道位于卡利西斯星区边境，这条航路本身极少发生变化，但却充满了危险。

languages.text: キャリクシス星域は人口が多く、重要な世界も多いが、帝国中枢部からは遠く離れている。キャリクシス星域の初代帝国総督は、アンジューで最も有能な将軍の一人であったドルススであり、現在では帝国聖教会の聖人として崇められている。キャリクシス星域は政治的にも物流的にもコロヌス・エクスパンスの辺境と固く結びついている。エクスパンスへの唯一の既知のルートは、キャリクシス星域の縁に設けられた安定しているが危険なワープルートであるコロヌス航路を通るものだからである。
languages.original_text: The Calixis Sector has many heavily populated and important worlds, but it lies a great distance from the Imperium's core sectors. The sector's first Imperial Sector Governor was Drusus, one of Angevin's most capable generals, a man now revered as a Saint of the Imperial Cult. The Calixis Sector is firmly bound to the frontier of the Koronus Expanse politically and logistically since the only known route to the Expanse lies through the Koronus Passage, a stable but dangerous warp route that was established on the rimward border of the Calixis Sector.

traits.locale_text: キャリクシス星域は人口が多く、重要な世界も多いが、帝国中枢部からは遠く離れている。キャリクシス星域の初代帝国総督は、アンジューで最も有能な将軍の一人であったドルススであり、現在では帝国聖教会の聖人として崇められている。キャリクシス星域は政治的にも物流的にもコロヌス・エクスパンスの辺境と固く結びついている。エクスパンスへの唯一の既知のルートは、キャリクシス星域の縁に設けられた安定しているが危険なワープルートであるコロヌス航路を通るものだからである。

languages.text: El sector Calixis consta de numerosos mundos densamente poblados e importantes, pero una gran distancia lo separa de los sectores centrales del Imperium. El primer gobernador de sector del Imperium fue Drusus, uno de los generales más competentes de Angevin a quien ahora se venera como santo del Culto Imperial. El sector Calixis tiene un vínculo estrecho con la Extensión de Koronus tanto en lo político como en lo logístico, ya que la única ruta conocida a la Extensión pasa por el Corredor de Koronus, una ruta de disformidad estable pero peligrosa establecida en el borde exterior del sector Calixis.
languages.original_text: The Calixis Sector has many heavily populated and important worlds, but it lies a great distance from the Imperium's core sectors. The sector's first Imperial Sector Governor was Drusus, one of Angevin's most capable generals, a man now revered as a Saint of the Imperial Cult. The Calixis Sector is firmly bound to the frontier of the Koronus Expanse politically and logistically since the only known route to the Expanse lies through the Koronus Passage, a stable but dangerous warp route that was established on the rimward border of the Calixis Sector.

traits.locale_text: El sector Calixis consta de numerosos mundos densamente poblados e importantes, pero una gran distancia lo separa de los sectores centrales del Imperium. El primer gobernador de sector del Imperium fue Drusus, uno de los generales más competentes de Angevin a quien ahora se venera como santo del Culto Imperial. El sector Calixis tiene un vínculo estrecho con la Extensión de Koronus tanto en lo político como en lo logístico, ya que la única ruta conocida a la Extensión pasa por el Corredor de Koronus, una ruta de disformidad estable pero peligrosa establecida en el borde exterior del sector Calixis.

languages.text: Calixis Sektörü, yoğun nüfuslu ve önemli çok sayıda dünyaya sahiptir ancak İmparatorluk'un merkezî sektörlerinden oldukça uzakta yer alır. Sektörün ilk İmparatorluk Sektör Valisi, Angevin'in en hünerli generallerinden biri olan ve şimdilerde İmparatorluk Tarikatı'nın azizlerinden biri olarak saygı duyulan Drusus'tur. Calixis Sektörü, Koronus Enginliği'nin sınırına hem siyasal hem de lojistik açıdan sıkı sıkıya bağlıdır. Bunun başlıca sebebi, Enginlik'e giden tek yolun Calixis Sektörü'nün dış kenarında kurulmuş istikrarlı fakat tehlikeli bir öteboyut rotası olan Koronus Geçidi'nden geçmesidir.
languages.original_text: The Calixis Sector has many heavily populated and important worlds, but it lies a great distance from the Imperium's core sectors. The sector's first Imperial Sector Governor was Drusus, one of Angevin's most capable generals, a man now revered as a Saint of the Imperial Cult. The Calixis Sector is firmly bound to the frontier of the Koronus Expanse politically and logistically since the only known route to the Expanse lies through the Koronus Passage, a stable but dangerous warp route that was established on the rimward border of the Calixis Sector.
